definition: to work solely on/to have as one's (or its) sole function/person or agency responsible for one specific thing
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: Awes the Reese special department weighs the world the right and wrong merit.

sentences.english: This is the history of China's first specialized in foreign trade regulatory body.
sentences.chinese: 这是中国历史上第一个专司对外贸易的管理机构。

sentences.english: He is also entitled the King of Wealth. He is the Guardian God of the Four Kings of the Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 也称为财宝天王，是四大天王中专司财富的保护神。

definition: to be in charge of something specific
in charge (of a position etc)/the person in charge/responsible
to fill a post/to act as
to supervise (troops)/to appoint (officers)/to select and assign
ordained or appointed to a post/to benefit from counsel
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)
to govern/to have complete control over/to be in command of
